description:
Microsoft said Wednesday that it is transforming Copilot into an app on Windows, and migrating the icon back to literally front and center on your PC.

Microsoft made reference to the change in its keynote addresses at Build, its developer conference in Seattle. But a blog post on Wednesday outlined Microsoft’s motivations for doing so, and what it plans to do with the Copilot Windows app.

get windows 11 pro for cheap

Windows 11 Pro
title: Microsoft’s Copilot AI upgrades to a dedicated Windows app

description:
Microsoft has released version 125 of the Microsoft Edge browser and it’s an intriguing one with more news than usual.

One of the most interesting additions is a new slider that lets you decide how much working memory Edge is allowed to use, which could be a key reason that pushes you to consider switching from Chrome to Edge.

get windows 11 pro for cheap
title: You can now limit how much memory Microsoft Edge uses

description:

I may be biased because I love having RGB lights on my desk, but this Corsair gaming mouse pad is simply gorgeous. It has 360-degree coverage through three dynamic RGB lighting zones, which you can control with a physical button or using the dedicated app.

title: Corsair’s RGB gaming mouse pad with USB ports is only $45 right now

description:
It’s not hard to find a monitor for a hundred bucks — go to Best Buy or Walmart and you can probably get one today. Finding a decent monitor for that price, well that’s another matter. Today Dell has one that fits the bill, a 23.8-inch screen with a quality IPS panel. It’s selling for just $99.99 on Dell’s official online store, a $20 savings off the regular price.

At just $100 you don’t get a lot of side dishes with this entree. The S2425H monitor doesn’t have many extra features, no USB ports and only one video connection, HDMI. But it’s got the goods
title: This 24-inch Dell IPS monitor is just $100 right now

description:

description:
How many times have you had anxiety about your phone dying on you while you’re out and about? You watch as the battery level drains down and down, and you have no access to an outlet.

The Anker Nano Power Bank solves that problem—and if you’re an Amazon Prime member, you can snag one for cheap right now. Currently available for just $19 in a Prime-exclusive deal, the price of this tiny power bank has never been lower.

With its 5000mAh capacity, it can easily handle most modern devices, and it has dual USB-C ports and a 22.5W output
title: Get the cable-free Anker Nano Power Bank for just $19

description:

Common causes of hard drive data loss

Hard drive data loss can result from many scenarios. Although recovering a hard drive with professional softwar
title: How to recover data from a hard drive: 3 top methods

description:
USB Type-C is the most flexible connection for notebooks and smartphones. The most important of its many capabilities is as a charging socket for battery-powered devices — this should finally make everything simple: One socket, one cable, one power supply for all devices – from computers to smartphones and tablets to headphones and other peripherals.

So much for the theory, which always sounds simple with USB. The practice is more confusing.

Not every USB-C power supply is suitable for every device, not all Type-C ports can be used to charge devices quickly or at all, and not every Type-C cable ensures reliable power transmission.

Our guide gives you an overview of the technical possibilities of Type-C charging and recommends suitable power supply units for all devices.

Further reading:
title: The confusing world of USB-C charging, explained
